mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat (order_id, customer_id, send_role, content, send_time, read_status) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{customerId}, #{sendRole}, #{content}, #{sendTime}, #{readStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT id, order_id, customer_id, send_role, content, send_time, read_status FROM chat WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY send_time ASC
